Description:

We are looking for Expert Java Streaming Technical Lead Remote(Pyspark, Kafka)/Oakland, CA. Anyone interested can share your resume at pkumar@radiansys.com

Title: Expert Java Streaming Technical Lead Remote(Pyspark, Kafka)/Oakland, CA Information Technology Work Type: HybridJob Location: Oakland, CA Full Time only
Position SummaryWe are looking for an Expert Technical Lead to be a part of our exciting and growing team. Your primary focus will be to provide technical leadership and mentorship across our Flink and Kafka real-time data platform and product engineering teams. You will lead technical design and implementation of real-time event driven use cases and drive technical feasibility discussions for our products as you collaborate with other technical leaders, product owners and development leads. You will be required to Client the boundaries of our platforms, provide solutions for technical problems and drive discussions within IT and Lines of Business. As a productive member of a motivated group of engineers, product teams, and technical analysts, you will be producing ground-breaking, forward thinking, and revolutionary projects that will modernize critical infrastructure.This position is hybrid, working from your remote office and your assigned work location based on business need.
